content.raw:
Deadline: June 30.

Required:

* Docker improvements:

    ☑ Improve development workflow. Issue ~~#71~~.



    ☐ Configure automatic builds. Issue #69.


* Issues:

    ☑ Ocean reflects the laser beams. Issue ~~#29~~.



    ☑ Wave physical and rendering synchronization. Issue ~~#23~~.



    ☑ Symbols do not appear in the images. Issue ~~#80~~.



    ☑ Remove visual artifact in camera view. Issue ~~#81~~.


* Scoring plugins:

    ☑ Add functionality to detect WAM-V collisions. Issue ~~#49~~.



    ☐ GUI overlay for debugging and easy task inspection. Issue #102.



    * ☑ Basic functionality
    * ☐ Style
    
* Competition infrastructure:

    ☑ Support the ability to specify task parameters via YAML file. Issue ~~#90~~.



    ☑ Support the ability to customize sensor location via YAML file. Issue ~~#89~~.



    ☐ Docker setup for running a competition with multiple teams, tasks and runs. Issue #106.



    ☑ Release 1.1.X ROS packages.



    ☑ Release 1.1.X Docker images.


* 3D objects:

    ☑ Add 3D monocular mesh. Issue ~~#85~~



    ☑ Add groundstation. Issue ~~#84~~



    ☑ Add WAM-V CPU cases. Issue ~~#83~~



    ☑ Add WAM-V batteries. Issue ~~#82~~



    ☑ Add 3D lidar mesh. Issue ~~#86~~


* Refinements:

    ☑ Improve wind model. Issue ~~#78~~ and issue ~~#91~~.



    ☑ Improve buoyancy model. Issue ~~#94~~.



    ☑ Add time incentive to scoring of Navigation task. Issue ~~#65~~.



    ☑ USV dynamics modifications. Issue ~~#57~~.



    ☑ Add a Sand Island texture.



    ☑ Vectored thrust. Issue ~~#96~~.


* Documentation and tutorials:

    ☑ Review tutorials for 1.1.X release.



    ☐ New tutorial describing how to run a competition locally.  
    ☑ Draft/proposed description of interactive event


* Competition Documents for Release to Teams - See shared google drive folder  
  These need to be drafted by 21 June for review.  
  ☑ Competition and task descriptions

    ☑ Technical guide
content.html:
Deadline: June 30.

Required:

  • Docker improvements:

    ☑ Improve development workflow. Issue #71.

    ☐ Configure automatic builds. Issue #69.

  • Issues:

    ☑ Ocean reflects the laser beams. Issue #29.

    ☑ Wave physical and rendering synchronization. Issue #23.

    ☑ Symbols do not appear in the images. Issue #80.

    ☑ Remove visual artifact in camera view. Issue #81.

  • Scoring plugins:

    ☑ Add functionality to detect WAM-V collisions. Issue #49.

    ☐ GUI overlay for debugging and easy task inspection. Issue #102.

    • ☑ Basic functionality
    • ☐ Style

  • Competition infrastructure:

    ☑ Support the ability to specify task parameters via YAML file. Issue #90.

    ☑ Support the ability to customize sensor location via YAML file. Issue #89.

    ☐ Docker setup for running a competition with multiple teams, tasks and runs. Issue #106.

    ☑ Release 1.1.X ROS packages.

    ☑ Release 1.1.X Docker images.

  • 3D objects:

    ☑ Add 3D monocular mesh. Issue #85

    ☑ Add groundstation. Issue #84

    ☑ Add WAM-V CPU cases. Issue #83

    ☑ Add WAM-V batteries. Issue #82

    ☑ Add 3D lidar mesh. Issue #86

  • Refinements:

    ☑ Improve wind model. Issue #78 and issue #91.

    ☑ Improve buoyancy model. Issue #94.

    ☑ Add time incentive to scoring of Navigation task. Issue #65.

    ☑ USV dynamics modifications. Issue #57.

    ☑ Add a Sand Island texture.

    ☑ Vectored thrust. Issue #96.

  • Documentation and tutorials:

    ☑ Review tutorials for 1.1.X release.

    ☐ New tutorial describing how to run a competition locally.
    ☑ Draft/proposed description of interactive event

  • Competition Documents for Release to Teams - See shared google drive folder
    These need to be drafted by 21 June for review.
    ☑ Competition and task descriptions

    ☑ Technical guide
